body: The cost of this task is **30 mins** (this is exactly how much will be paid, not less not more) when the task is done
@yegor256 could you please pick this up?
@yegor256 please post your status here.. Keep in mind that every task is expected to be finished in a few days maximum.
@yegor256 since there is no activity in the last few days in this task I decided to ask you to let us know what's going on... How are things going?
@yegor256 please stop working with this task immediately
@jdevelop This task is yours, please go ahead keeping in mind [this](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles)
@jdevelop please don't touch this task, someone else will pick it up
@longtimeago This task is yours, please go ahead keeping in mind [this](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles). If any questions, don't hesitate to ask right here

@yegor256 Could you please clarify what operations should support Gitignore API. My suggestion is to have one Gitignore interface with operations: String rendered(@NotNull(message = "Template name can't be NULL") String name) throws IOException String raw(@NotNull(message = "Template name can't be NULL") String name) throws IOException; do we need Template interface to support iteration over them on Gitignore? what do you think?
@yegor256 Good evening! Yegor, I need your advice about API (see comment above)
@longtimeago I think we need three methods: `rendered(String)`, `raw(String)`, and `iterate()` (to fully cover the API)
